input.sentences: i love to play the games at the fair . i hope i win !
next stop is food . what should i choose ?
the ferris wheel is always a favorite ride of mine .
i hope this is n't too scary in here .
it 's sunny out | i think i should get a hat .
output.sentences: If you want to win a girl's love take her to the carnival and play a game of chance.
Buy her hot dogs and lemonade.
Take her for as many rides as her stomach can handle
Then go see a show of oddities.
Finally buy her a hat or some other souvenir and you will have won her for at least a week.
